meaning_str.bing:
n. 发誓；〈口〉誓言；咒骂；骂人话
v. 诅咒；咒骂；说脏话；郑重承诺
网络. 宣誓；思薇雅

发誓；〈口〉誓言；咒骂；骂人话
诅咒；咒骂；说脏话；郑重承诺

发誓；保证；宣誓；立誓；宣誓就职；使宣誓；（尤指在法庭上）发誓；郑重承诺；作出宣誓；咒骂；说脏话

1.en: I always do something like this----one minute I'm making swear to keep away from undeserved relationship, the next I get into trouble love.
1.cn: 我总做这样的事-刚才还发誓远离不值得的关系，然后就卷入了麻烦的爱情。

2.en: Although they have been sieged for almost a week, the soldiers swear never to yield the ground to the enemy.
2.cn: 尽管已经被包围了将近一周，战士们发誓绝不将阵地放弃给敌人。

3.en: Then he began to curse and to swear: I do not know the man! And immediately a rooster crowed.
3.cn: 彼得遂发咒起誓说，我不认得那个人。立时鸡就叫了。

0.en: You won't let go? No. Swear? I swear. Okay.
0.cn: 你不会放手？我不会。你发誓。我发誓。

1.en: I swear to you, that's the guy.

2.en: I swear you said you had the keys.
2.cn: 你说你带了钥匙，我发誓。

3.en: You have to swear you will not tell anyone.
3.cn: 你必须要发誓，不会告诉任何人。

4.en: Sheldon, I swear to God, I'm gonna kill you.
4.cn: 谢尔顿，我发誓我一定要杀了你。

5.en: I swear. I swear on this bag of Cool Ranch, which is way more disgusting than I remembered, by the way.
5.cn: 我发誓，我以这袋垃圾食品的名义发誓，其实它，这东西比我印象中的难吃多了

6.en: I didn't say any. I swear. I did not say anything, I swear. He stopped by.
6.cn: 我什么都没说，我发誓他只是顺口说的。

7.en: Just trust me. And possibly kill me. I mean, I'd like to. I really would. But you... Swear to me. Swear to me on your mother.
7.cn: 你就相信我。可能还要杀了我。我倒是愿意。真的。但是你... 向我发誓。以你母亲的名义向我发誓。

8.en: I swear, no harm will come to you as long as I live.
8.cn: 我发誓，只要我活着的一天，你不会受到任何伤害。

9.en: Tell me about it. One time, I swear I pooped out a stick of chalk.
9.cn: 可不是嘛，我发誓有一次我拉出了一整条。

10.en: What is she doing here? I was meeting Nate. Just to talk, I swear.
10.cn: 她在这里干什么？我在等内特。只是谈谈而已，我发誓。

11.en: Swear you'll take us there. Cross your heart. Cross it. Cross your heart.
11.cn: 发誓你会带我们去的，向胸口画十字，画啊，向胸口画十字。

12.en: You mean the one that my grandmother made me swear on her deathbed that I would never let out of our family?
12.cn: 我外婆临死前要我发誓，绝不会泄露给外人的饼干食谱？

13.en: Are you tricking me? No, Jack, I swear. He is safe at home in the backyard with his Ma.
13.cn: 你在耍我吗？没有，杰克，我发誓，它很安全，在后院和它妈妈在一起。

14.en: I swear, he didn't try to get out of the way. I put him down myself. Right over there. I'm sorry.
14.cn: 我发誓，他都没想要躲开，我亲手放倒了他，就在那边。我很抱歉。

15.en: That's not me, I swear. You were in your hotel room taking a nap? Yes, I was in my hotel room.
15.cn: 这不是我，我发誓。你在你的酒店房间里小憩？是的，我待在酒店房间。

16.en: Nothing. Nothing. I swear to God I didn't know you guys would be here. And the good news is you didn't believe in soul mates. So…
16.cn: 我发誓我不知道你们在这里，你不相信心灵伴侣，所以…

17.en: Ms. Thompson, the transponders you make at the factory, what do they do? I don't know. I swear to God.
17.cn: 汤普森女士，你在工厂制作的转调器是做什么用的？我不知道，我发誓。

18.en: Because if you don't, I swear to God, I will never ever forget. Do you understand now? Yes.
18.cn: 因为如果你不照做，我向上帝发誓，我永远都不会忘记，现在你明白了吗？明白。

19.en: I feel like it went down the drain. It was an accident. I swear. I love fish. I would never hurt one.
19.cn: 我有种它被冲走了的感觉，我发誓是场意外，我超爱鱼，我永远不会伤害它们。
